FORM.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the following effect if you have a Gene of this type, otherwise Channel the gene.

ADAPT.DESCRIPTION: Consume a channeled Gene to add its effect to the adapting card until the end of the combat and shuffle the card in your draw pile. NL Adapted effects target the same enemy as the card if possible.

SHIFT.DESCRIPTION: Move the gene back to the end of the orb line.

RANDO.DESCRIPTION: Randomized Forms are selected when the card is created and vary from a card to another.

FATE.DESCRIPTION: At the start of next turn, refill your draw pile to this amount and #yScry this amount.

GROWTH.DESCRIPTION: Upon reaching 2 Growth gain 1 Energy and reduce Growth by 2.

LUST.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the base damage of the next attack by this amount.

DRONE.DESCRIPTION: 0-cost temporary Attack which gives #yBlock if not played.

FEATHER.DESCRIPTION: 0-cost #yHarpy skill which returns #yFeather #yStorm to your hand.

RAGE.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an #yAttack, gain this amount of #yBlock

SHADOWS.DESCRIPTION: When #yShadows reaches its threshold it deals 2 damage per stack and applies 1 #yWeak to all enemies. NL The threshold starts each combat at 1.
